NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Name length must be a maximum of {length} letters.
SURNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Surname lenght must be at least {length} letters.
SURNAME_MAX_LENGTH: Surname lenght must be at maximum {length} letters.
EMAIL_MIN_LENGTH: E-mail lenght must be at least {length} letters.
EMAIL_MAX_LENGTH: E-mail length must be a maximum of {length} letters.

PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH: Password length must be a maximum of {length} letters.
CHECK_REGISTER_VERIFICATION_MAIL: Verification code sent to your e-mail..
CODE_OR_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: E-mail is not registered or the code is incorrect.
VERIFIED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your account has been successfully verified.
NOT_EMPTY: Any field must not be empty.
NOT_CONNECT_LINKEDIN: The linkedin link is not active in your current account.
NOT_CONNECT_GOOGLE: The google link is not active in your current account.
CANNOT_UNLINK_MAIN_ACCOUNT: Hesabınızı {value} ile oluşturduğunuz için bağlantısını kaldıramazsınız(ingilizce)

SUCCESSFULL_DISCONNECT_ACCOUNT: Your {value} account has been successfully unlinked.
PASSWORD_RULES: Your password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase letter, special character and number.
